participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Easy-going and hardworking, he enjoys simple pleasures and values family.
participant_1.background: i'm an electrician. i work my parents farms. i only listen to country music. i've a pet cow.

participant_2.name: Lila
participant_2.personality: Passionate and determined, she often expresses her feelings through music and is resilient despite challenges.
participant_2.background: my favorite type of music to sing is folk music. i am a musician and hope to make it big some day. i play the piano and guitar and sing. my parents are not very supportive of my dream.
